A discourse of the plurality of worlds written in French by the most ingenious author of the Dialogues of the dead ; and translated into English by Sir W.D., Knight. Entretiens sur la pluralité des mondes. English Fontenelle, M. de (Bernard Le Bovier), 1657-1757. W. D., Sir.
[16], 86 p.
Printed by Andr. Crook and Sam. Helsham, for William Norman ..., Dublin : 1687.
Translation of: Entretiens sur la pluralité des mondes. Errata: p. [16]. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
